**Title**
Request for Information: Permafrost Pre-Thaw Program for Giant Mine Remediation Project
=====================================

**Notice ID**
WS4609888571/Doc4610076562

**Tender Closing Date**: 
July 16, 2024, at 2:00 PM (EDT)

**Procurement Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
Radio-Canada, Quebec G1V 4J9

**Contact**
Dallas Scott (they/them)
Public Services and Procurement Canada (SPAC/PSPC)
dallas.scott@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice Type**
Request for Information: Seeking Technologies for Permafrost Pre-Thaw

Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of Crown Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC), invites suppliers and industry to provide information and feedback regarding technologies suitable for pre-thawing areas of permafrost to support site preparation activities for the Giant Mine Remediation Project.

This Request for Information aims to gather information from suppliers on technologies that could be applied to pre-thaw areas of permafrost to advance site preparation activities for the project. The goal is to identify innovative solutions that can support the project's objectives and contribute to the development of effective pre-thawing technologies.

**Notice Details**
* Procurement category: SRV
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* UNSPSC codes: 81100000, 81101500
* Procurement description: Professional engineering services and civil engineering

**Additional Information**
The submission deadline is July 16, 2024, at 2:00 PM (EDT). Suppliers are invited to submit their information and feedback via the Ariba Discovery website.
